parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The path to the backup file.

parameters.name: SnapshotHash
parameters.description: The hash value of the backup file.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the server to which an anti-ransomware policy is applied.
